job_tasks.phrase: you will be working on the core backend solutions, powering PerfectScale data pipeline and business logic.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the fundamental task of developing and maintaining the core backend systems of a product, which is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers to deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration across different engineering disciplines to deliver software solutions, a key aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing features. From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the full software development lifecycle, from conception to ongoing maintenance, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the product development process, suggesting contributions to feature proposals and product direction, which is part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about writing high-quality, maintainable code, a fundamental software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: you will also ensure clean code and best practices while performing code reviews for your peers
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews are a standard practice in software development to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on maintaining and improving the existing software codebase, which is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: you will be collaborating with product managers, and developers from other teams
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with different roles and teams, fitting the definition of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates collaboration with various engineering disciplines.

job_tasks.phrase: Providing feedback. The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
job_tasks.justification: This describes active participation in team discussions and providing feedback, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.
This indicates involvement in strategic product decisions, aligning technical work with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
job_tasks.justification: Proposing new features and additions to products implies understanding business needs and contributing to product strategy.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as backend development, feature implementation, code quality, maintenance, and collaboration across engineering teams. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related technologies or tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing entirely on backend software engineering without any mention of AI or ML. This makes the classification straightforward and highly confident.
